:: Wolfgang ::   (( The escape was failed. Wolfgang never broke the chair. ))

:: Still in the chair unharmed, Wolfgang stays restless. A slight shade of 
madness sweeps the self-proclaimed leader. Wolfgang seemes to start rocking 
in his chair, slightly mumbling to himself. ::

Well, that little ingrate seems to be back on a failed mission. The Stupid DD 
like to firwe in wake in pie fortunet og fee no yes am I LEADER! (( those 
arent spelling mistakes. ))

:: Waits in silence. ::
